name: Tinker's Tome Vol. (Uncommon)
entries: This tome contains the secrets of invention and innovation.

It can be read over 1 week to gain +10 towards one Simple invention blueprint progress. Alternatively, a creature reading it can instead read the book to increase their Teaching, Tinkering, or Smithing labor tier by 1.
Once this book has been used in this way 2 times it becomes no longer magical. Reading the book can be done during leisure time which requires 8 hours of reading in that week.
